meanings.definition: Not idealized or portrayed in a romanticized manner.
meanings.sent1: The movie showed the unromanticized version of a messy breakup.
meanings.sent2: The unromanticized view of the city revealed its true grit and character.
meanings.sent3: She had an unromanticized approach to love, preferring practicality over fairy tales.
meanings.sent4: His unromanticized painting style captured the raw essence of everyday life.
meanings.sent5: The unromanticized reality of war hit him hard, stripping away any illusions of glory.

meanings.definition: To present or depict something in a realistic or unembellished way.
meanings.sent1: The documentary unromanticized the struggles of everyday people.
meanings.sent2: She always unromanticized her achievements, never seeking praise or attention.
meanings.sent3: He unromanticized the story, focusing on facts rather than embellishments.
meanings.sent4: The artist unromanticized the landscape, highlighting its raw beauty.
meanings.sent5: The author unromanticized the characters, portraying them as flawed and human.
